DOC.brief_summary: This study investigates the relationship between autonomic dysfunction and chronic inflammation in hemodialysis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Autonomic Dysfunction and Inflammation in Chronic Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Chronic Kidney Disease Stadium KDIGO 5D for at leat 3 months on Dialysis Age >18 years Sinus action in EKG Patient capable for informed consent Written and signed informed consent Clinical overt signs of infections of any kind Active malign disease CRP levels above 50 mg/L Cardiac Pace Maker Atrial Fibrillation Refusal of informed consent Cardiac Transplantation Immunosuppressive medication
